suite.name: test receiveQRcode

kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.msg: Opening url 'https://demo.cyclos.org/ui/home'
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
